chrComHwNeId.name: chrComHwNeId
chrComHwNeId.description: A unique ID of each NE, given to NE in its installation.

chrComHwNeType.name: chrComHwNeType
chrComHwNeType.description: Metropolis2000 - Terminal Metropolis2500 - Enhanced Terminal Metropolis4000 - Standard HE Metropolis4500 - Enhanced HE.

chrComHwNeRunningSwVersion.name: chrComHwNeRunningSwVersion
chrComHwNeRunningSwVersion.description: The NE running SW Version - represented by XX.YY.ZZZ

chrComHwNeAvailableSwVersion.name: chrComHwNeAvailableSwVersion
chrComHwNeAvailableSwVersion.description: List of SW versions that might be switched with the current running one - represented by list of: XX.YY.ZZZ

chrComHwNeNextSessionSwVersion.name: chrComHwNeNextSessionSwVersion
chrComHwNeNextSessionSwVersion.description: The SW Version that shall be switched with the current running one - represented by XX.YY.ZZZ

chrComHwNeAvailableConfigurationSets.name: chrComHwNeAvailableConfigurationSets
chrComHwNeAvailableConfigurationSets.description: List configuration files that might be switched with the current one used by the running software.

chrComHwNeNextSessionConfigurationSet.name: chrComHwNeNextSessionConfigurationSet
chrComHwNeNextSessionConfigurationSet.description: The configuration file that shall be switched with the current one.

chrComHwNeTimeofDay.name: chrComHwNeTimeofDay
chrComHwNeTimeofDay.description: The NE Time of Day represented by - MM-DD-YYYY HH:MM:SS

chrComHwNeDailyPMStartOfTime.name: chrComHwNeDailyPMStartOfTime
chrComHwNeDailyPMStartOfTime.description: Describes the PM loging start time

chrComHwNeCriticalAlarmCounter.name: chrComHwNeCriticalAlarmCounter
chrComHwNeCriticalAlarmCounter.description: Specifies the number of Critical Alarms for the NE.

chrComHwNeMajorAlarmCounter.name: chrComHwNeMajorAlarmCounter
chrComHwNeMajorAlarmCounter.description: Specifies the number of Major Alarms for the NE.

chrComHwNeMinorAlarmCounter.name: chrComHwNeMinorAlarmCounter
chrComHwNeMinorAlarmCounter.description: Specifies the number of Minor Alarms for the NE.

chrComHwNeDetectionFaultStabilizationTim.name: chrComHwNeDetectionFaultStabilizationTime
chrComHwNeDetectionFaultStabilizationTim.description: The time the NE waits before reporting an occurrence of alarm to the NMS.

chrComHwNeRemovalFaultStabilizationTime.name: chrComHwNeRemovalFaultStabilizationTime
chrComHwNeRemovalFaultStabilizationTime.description: The time the NE waits before reporting clearing of alarm to NMS.

chrComHwNeAtmfM4NeSuppressZeroStats.name: chrComHwNeAtmfM4NeSuppressZeroStats
chrComHwNeAtmfM4NeSuppressZeroStats.description: When the vaule of this type is true, no PM entry will be created in any of the historical statistics tables for intervals in which all counts are zero

chrComHwNeResetPMCountersAction.name: chrComHwNeResetPMCountersAction
chrComHwNeResetPMCountersAction.description: This action enables resetting all preformance management counters currently measured by the NE (reset all xxxCurrentTable primitives). Note that PM might be reset also per entity (e.g. per one specifc Sonet Line interface). This value is set to True for activation of the reset action. On completion the NE sets back to False.

chrComHwNeACOActivationAction.name: chrComHwNeACOActivationAction
chrComHwNeACOActivationAction.description: Alarm Cut Off activation operation. This value is set to True for activation of the ACO action. On completion the NE sets back to False.

chrComHwNeAtmCbrRatesList.name: chrComHwNeAtmCbrRatesList
chrComHwNeAtmCbrRatesList.description: This vector includes 32 CBR peak cell rates that are supported in the network.

chrComHwNeAtmRtVbrRatesList.name: chrComHwNeAtmRtVbrRatesList
chrComHwNeAtmRtVbrRatesList.description: This vector includes the 16 RT-VBR Sustainable cell rates that are supported in the network.

chrComHwNeMaxPathPM.name: chrComHwNeMaxPathPM
chrComHwNeMaxPathPM.description: The maximum number of paths for which PM might be collected.

chrComHwNeCurrentPathPM.name: chrComHwNeCurrentPathPM
chrComHwNeCurrentPathPM.description: The actual number of paths for which PM is currently collected.

chrComHwNeGlobalSubnetID.name: chrComHwNeGlobalSubnetID
chrComHwNeGlobalSubnetID.description: Array of two entries: Subnet #1 Global ID, Subnet #2 Global ID.
